metadata.title: CVE-2012-4753 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in ownCloudbefore 4.0.5 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication ofunspecified victims via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1').
